A1033 Somerdon Roundabout Marfleet Avenue Pavement Patching westbound (3364) with full closures. Diversion route for vehicles (except HGVs) From A1033 Salt End Roundabout onto Staithes Road to Preston then north via B1240, B1239 and west via B1238 to roundabout with A165. At the roundabout exit onto A165 and continue to Maybury Road. Follow Maybury Road which becomes Marfleet Lane and rejoin A1033 West at Marfleet Roundabout. Diversion for HGVs Exit A1033 via Hariff Lane, proceed further to the north via Main Street and Burstwick Road (B1362) then right onto Daisy Hill Road to the junction with White s Close Lane. At the junction continue left onto White s Close Lane which becomes Newfield Lane to its junction with Nuttles Lane. Follow Nuttles Lane which becomes Lelley Road to junction with B1239 then turn right onto B1239 (Wyton Road) and continue via B1239, B1238 to roundabout with A165. At the roundabout exit onto A165 and continue to Maybury Road. Follow Maybury Road which becomes Marfleet Lane and rejoin A1033 West at Marfleet Roundabout. Alternative diversion for HGVs From A1033 Salt End Roundabout onto Staithes Road to Preston then turn onto Weghill Road and travel to junction with B1362. At the junction turn left onto B1362 and continue to junction with Burstwick Road. At the junction turn left onto Daisy Hill Road and follow diversion for HGV.

A1033 Marfleet to Somerdon Elba St Patching (1742) with full closures eastbound. Diversion route in place, diversion for vehicles (except HGVs) From Marfleet Roundabout follow Marfleet Avenue which becomes Marfleet Lane and Maybury Road to junction with A165 Holderness Road. Continue north on A165, turn onto the B1238 east, then the B1239 south which becomes the B1240 to Preston. Turn onto Staithes Road and follow until Salt End Roundabout to continue journey. Diversion for HGVs From Marfleet Roundabout follow Marfleet Avenue which becomes Marfleet Lane and Maybury Road to junction with A165 Holderness Road. Continue north on A165, turn onto the B1238 east and then onto B1239 south. Turn left and follow Lelley Road and Nuttles Lane to junction with Newfield Lane. Follow Newfield Lane and White s Close Lane. At the junction turn right and continue to junction with B1362. Turn right and follow B1362 west, turn onto Weghill Road and continue on Staithes Road until Salt End Roundabout. Alternative diversion for HGVs From Marfleet Roundabout follow Marfleet Avenue which becomes Marfleet Lane and Maybury Road to junction with A165 Holderness Road. Continue north on A165, turn onto the B1238 east and then onto B1239 south. Turn left and follow Lelley Road and Nuttles Lane to junction with Newfield Lane. Follow Newfield Lane and White s Close Lane, Burstwick Road and Hariff Lane to A1033.
